channel.title: The Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Guests Thread
channel.description: Hey Everyone! This is the big thread where I'll be announcing Gauntlet Con guests! I'll adding a post each day as we announce guests for this year's con.

item.title: The Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Guests Thread
item.dc:creator: @RichardRuane
item.description:
@RichardRuane wrote:

It’s our final guest announcement!

@Humza_K of Hydra Cooperative will be a guest this year for Gauntlet Con 2019! Read his blog and find him on Twitter.

Check out his profile.

At Gauntlet Con, he’ll be running the Hydra setting book Misty Isles of the Eld using D&D B/X:
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpBvmTQsw43Lc3U39tk

Read full topic
item.source: The Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Guests Thread

Check out his profile.

At Gauntlet Con, Daniel will be running his game Ross Rifles:

item.title: The Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Guests Thread
item.dc:creator: @RichardRuane
item.description:
@RichardRuane wrote:

I’m excited to announce that Miguel Ángel Espinoza (@miguelmx) will return as a guest at Gauntlet Con 2019!

You can check out Mike’s profile on the con site.

For Gauntlet Con, Mike will be running his own game, Nahual:
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpJwPchxQuqnAmeem_8
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpJwnuze3_hDzlxrMJ9

Check out their profile on the con site.

And check out their sessions of Ravenous (Playtest):

item.description:
@RichardRuane wrote:

ENnie-winning Gauntlet friend and forum participant @Jagash (Jason Pitre) will be a guest at Gauntlet Con 2019!

Read his profile on the con website.

At Gauntlet Con, Jason will be running sessions of his new game After the War:

  • https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoGyGb4RreixuQxjR5c

item.title: The Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Guests Thread
item.dc:creator: @RichardRuane
item.description:
@RichardRuane wrote:

Brendan LaSalle will be joining us at Gauntlet Con 2019! He’s the creator of XCrawl for Goodman Games and will be bringing DCC and the new XCrawl Classics.

Check out his bio!

Check out the sessions of XCrawl Classics that he’s running:
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lo7FLDtWTeFgGM1I11y

Check out the Dungeon Crawl Classics RPG sessions he’s running:
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lo7DUaV6uAG1ScV8OW0
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lo7ESaWEvVldUGghwOW
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lo7FqxaMHLoOJ9KnxXR

item.title: The Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Guests Thread
item.dc:creator: @RichardRuane
item.description:
@RichardRuane wrote:

The big guest announcement today (and it includes 6 people, so it’s a big announcement) is that Misdirected Mark Productions & Encoded Designs are coming to Gauntlet Con 2019! We’re looking forward to seeing Angela, Chris, Monia, Phil, Rai, and Senda at Gauntlet Con this year! Thanks to @flatvurm for making this happen.

Check out their bio on the con site.

Read full topic
item.source: The Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Guests Thread

item.title: The Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Guests Thread
item.dc:creator: @RichardRuane
item.description:
@RichardRuane wrote:

It announcement time today, and the big announcement is that @Jay is returning a guest for Gauntlet Con again this year!

Jay is the founder of UFO Press, and creator of Legacy 2E, Worlds of Legacy, Mythsea, and so much more.

You can hear Jay talk about her game Legacy on +1 Forward. Then check out her profile on the con website.

Check out Jay’s Voidheart Symphony session at Gauntlet Con:
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpCzukO5azUj5_TnUnN

Read full topic

item.title: The Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Guests Thread
item.dc:creator: @RichardRuane
item.description:
@RichardRuane wrote:

Pelgrane Press will be a guest at Gauntlet Con this year!

We’ll be joined by Cat Tobin and Gareth Ryder-Hanrahan. Listed to Gareth’s interview on Gauntlet Podcast #119. Check out their bio on the Gauntlet Con website.

Check out their 13th Age Session:
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lp3ZlJACw4XlKRIPYru

Check out their Night’s Black Agents Session:
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lp3_t1ifuD8G0oPiKpC

Check out Rise & Fall (From Seven Wonders):
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lp5o-8keVu-EyXbkyky

@RichardRuane wrote:

Today we’re announcing Mendez is going to be a guest at Gauntlet Con 2019!

Check out his profile on the con website!

At the con, James will be running his own game Thousand Arrows:
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoP26SR-g1M5LHfdoAp

item.source: The Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Guests Thread

item.title: The Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Guests Thread
item.dc:creator: @RichardRuane
item.description:
@RichardRuane wrote:

GMDK, which publishes The Demon Collective zine and the upcoming English edition of Libreté RPG is coming to Gauntlet Con! We’ll be joined by David Shugars, FM Geist, Camilla Greer, and @V.Feasson!

Check out their bio on the Con site.

Camilla Greer will be running her adventure “Night School” with her own Flailsnails OSR system:
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LomebGfxLMmYDiKpiF5

FM Geist will be running Roll 4 Tarrasque’s “Bakto’s Terrifying Cuisine” with Into the Odd:
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LogErWj-jrbj6YjW2g4

David Shugars is running Whitehack: The Vanilla Module:
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoxA3IYumObp_RJ3sYs

@V.Feasson is running Libreté:
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Loz3EgiMAzRBv2LS734
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Loz2akoTB60811DOk3X

Stay tuned for more GMDK event announcements!

Read full topic
item.source: The Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Guests Thread

Check out Ben’s sessions at Gauntlet Con:

item.title: The Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Guests Thread
item.dc:creator: @RichardRuane
item.description:
@RichardRuane wrote:

Our Friday guests shouldn’t need an introduction in Gauntlet Spaces. Hayley and Vee have both been active parts of The Gauntlet community and were recently guests on The Gauntlet Podcast. Their game Good Society brought home an IGDN Groundbreaker award for Best Rules.

Check out their profile on the con website

.

Read full topic
item.source: The Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Guests Thread

item.title: The Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Guests Thread
item.dc:creator: @RichardRuane
item.description:
@RichardRuane wrote:

Abigail LaLonde will be a guest at Gauntlet Con 2019! They’ve been a cartographer and illustrator on Pentola Beneath the Canals projects and have a Patreon for their cartographic work.

You can check out Abigail’s profile on the con site.

At Gauntlet Con, they’ll be running:

  • The Cat/Kid Hack
  • Monster of the Week

Read full topic
item.source: The Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Guests Thread

item.title: The Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Guests Thread
item.dc:creator: @RichardRuane
item.description:
@RichardRuane wrote:

Our second guest is Sharang Biswas. I’ve had the privilege of knowing Sharang since 2013 when we met at our Friendly Local Game Store. He won his second IGDN Groundbreaker Award for Most Innovative game this year, and his work has appeared in Codex.

You can read Sharang’s profile on the con website.

Check out Sharang’s events at Gauntlet Con:

  • Spire by Grant Howitt)

Read full topic
item.source: The Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Guests Thread

item.title: The Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Guests Thread
item.dc:creator: @RichardRuane
item.description:
@RichardRuane wrote:

The first guest we’re announcing is Diogo Nogueira (@Diogo_Nogueira) of Oldskull Publishing. You might have heard me talk about Diogo’s game “Dark Streets & Darker Secrets” back in August for The Gauntlet Podcast.

You can check out Diogo’s profile on the con website.

At Gauntlet Con, check out Diogo’s events:

  • Dark Streets & Darker Secrets - The Coming of the Famine Lord
  • Solar Blades & Cosmic Spells - The Living Weapon

Read full topic
